long_description: A great weight for cool-weather running, the Manzella Sprint Touch Tip(TM) gloves not only keep your hands warm, they also let you operate your touch-screen electronics. Send text messages and surf the web on your touch-screen phone with the Touch Tip fabric on the index fingers and thumbs. Breathable, stretchy polyester fabric allows great dexterity. Grippy palms help you hold onto your cell phone or digital music player. Wipe your cold nose with the soft terry fabric on the thumbs. Please note: unisex sizing is based on the men's size chart.
